DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if what you eat affets your insulin sensitivity when you lose a small amount of weight
DOC.brief_title: The DINE Study-Diet Intervention to Negate Diabetes Study (Improving Weight Loss Outcomes for African Americans)
DOC.criteria: African American adults (age â‰¥ 19) Obese (BMI > or equal to 30 kg/m2) Otherwise generally healthy Diagnoses of diabetes Malignancy or other states where weight loss is contraindicated (pregnancy Individuals with high blood pressure on medications.
